Text: Well, it seems we have two girls.
One is asleep, one is awake. \n Perhaps some good will come of bringing them together.
She's from another time and place... \n Bringing her here wasn't easy...
Raven... I don't think \n she can see me.
Wh-What's happening? \n I can't change gravity \n styles.
Did she do something \n to me!?
Only one way \n to find out...
Controlling those stone \n tablets, removing my \n powers...

What's she doing 
 to me? I need to 
 catch her and get 
 some answers!
Finally, I can shift \n gravity again!
But I still can't \n change styles...
She's the only one \n that can give me my \n powers back...
Now I'm heavy and still \n can't shift...

Raven can't hear me, 
 but I wonder if she's 
 going through the 
 same trial...

If I could just catch 
 that strange woman, 
 maybe I could get some 
 answers...
Phew, I can shift \n gravity again!
But still no luck \n changing styles...
I really have to catch \n that woman!
Why is she giving \n me this much power?
Shoot, just when I was trying to find Raven.
Taking to the air now, huh?
Follow the Mysterious Woman \n Further Inside
Follow the Mysterious Woman \n Further Inside
Another stone tablet means another challenge.
Can I defeat them all even when I'm so light?
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat all of your enemies.
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat all of your enemies.
Stone Tablet: \n Continue without shifting gravity.
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat your enemies without shifting gravity.
Stone Tablet: \n Chase the mysterious woman across the fragile surface.
Defeat Your Enemies \n Without Shifting Gravity
Chase the Mysterious Woman \n Across the Fragile Surface
I should be able to fight.
Hey, the gas isn't hurting me...
Now she's looking for a fight!
I need to find a way to avoid those debris attacks...
I think I can get her while she's gathering that debris.
Follow the Mysterious Woman \n Further Inside
Search for the Mysterious \n Woman Further Inside
